name: Technology Terms
author: Cascade AI
description: A list of common technology-related terms.

words.hint: An electronic device for storing and processing data.
A set of instructions that a computer follows to perform a task.
An input device used to type text and commands into a computer.
A display device that shows visual output from a computer.
The programs and operating systems used by a computer.
The physical parts of a computer system.
A global network connecting millions of computers and devices.
A group of interconnected computers and devices.
A step-by-step procedure for solving a problem or completing a task.
An organized collection of data that can be accessed electronically.
A popular high-level programming language.
A tool that helps identify and fix errors in code.
A numbering system using only 0s and 1s, used by computers.
Hardware used to store data temporarily or permanently in a computer.
A path in which electrons flow to power electronic devices.
Software programmed into hardware devices.
A text-based interface used to control a computer system.
A file containing code that automates tasks.
A self-contained piece of code that can be reused.
A piece of electronic equipment, such as a smartphone or laptop.
